summary: Completed e2e testing of 'Zonas Calientes' feature. All 11 backend tests passed (POST/GET/DELETE /api/taxi-needed-zones). Frontend UI verified: 'Reportar Calle Caliente' button visible, 'Zonas con demanda' section displays reported zones correctly, 'Ver todo' modal opens and shows zone details with 'Ir con GPS' navigation buttons.

issues: The 'Reportar Calle Caliente' button shows 'Esperando ubicaci√≥n...' when location is denied - this is expected behavior but could use a more informative message explaining why location is needed

critical_code_review_comments: License number displayed as 'Desconocido' for admin user - the admin account doesn't have a license_number set. This is expected behavior but zones created by admin show 'Licencia Desconocido' which may be confusing for real users.
The reportTaxiNeededZone function correctly disables the button when location is not available (line 8520: disabled={reportingTaxiZone || !currentLocation})
seed_data_creation: Created test zones via API tests: Multiple zones in Madrid area created for testing POST/DELETE flows. Zones auto-expire after 1 hour.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Taxi Needed Zones (Zonas Calientes) feature is fully functional. Backend endpoints at /api/taxi-needed-zones support POST, GET, DELETE with proper auth. Frontend UI shows report button (disabled without location), zones list with count badges, and modal with detailed zone info including reporter licenses and GPS navigation buttons. Tests in /app/backend/tests/test_taxi_needed_zones.py cover CRUD operations, deduplication (30 min), authorization checks, and full workflow.

verified_features.POST /api/taxi-needed-zones: PASS - Creates zone with reverse geocoding for street name
verified_features.GET /api/taxi-needed-zones: PASS - Returns aggregated zones with reporters, sorted by distance when user location provided
verified_features.DELETE /api/taxi-needed-zones/{zone_id}: PASS - Only owner or admin can delete, returns 404 for non-existent zones
verified_features.Deduplication: PASS - Reports from same location within 30 min are rejected
verified_features.Authorization: PASS - All endpoints require authentication, return 401 without token
verified_features.UI: Reportar Calle Caliente button: PASS - Visible in Street tab with flame icon, disabled without location
verified_features.UI: Zonas con demanda section: PASS - Shows zone count, street name, report count, and last report time
verified_features.UI: Ver todo modal: PASS - Opens correctly, shows all zone details with 'Reportado por' info and 'Ir con GPS' buttons
verified_features.UI: GPS Navigation: PASS - Navigation buttons present for each zone
